name: Zero-Knowledge Machine Learning for Autonomous Worlds Workshop
description: Explore the world of Zero-Knowledge Machine Learning (ZKML) in this hands-on workshop. Discover how to use ZKML to create immersive game worlds, craft narratives, and define onchain physics for richer Autonomous Worlds.

speakers.name: Dante
speakers.bio: Dante is currently building EZKL, a library for zero-knowledge computation. In the past, he was a dusty academic studying neural networks.
